select a.refund_price, a.is_agree, d.title, e.url, f.store_name, g.after_sale_type, GROUP_CONCAT(specv.value) as goodsspecifitionvalue from ky_refund_application a left join ky_order_detail b on a.order_id=b.order_id left join ky_product_sku c on b.sku_id=c.sku_id left join ky_product_info d on c.product_id=d.product_id left join ky_product_picture e on c.product_id=e.relation_id left join ky_store_info f on d.store_id=f.store_id left join ky_refurn_reason g on a.reason_id=g.reason_id left join ky_product_spec_value specv ON specv.id IN (c.spec_value_ids) where a.deleted=0 and d.deleted=0 and c.deleted=0 and e.type=1 and e.is_main=1 and f.deleted=0
and a.user_id=#{userId}
